Hi, 

we are using the Heritrix 3.0 API in order to invoke the heritrix fun=
ctionality from our HTTP client. 

The reference for this is

https://webar=
chive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+API+Guide

For Submitting=
 a CXML Job Configuration File i see the URL given is wrong. 

the one whic=
h is given in the URL is 

https://(heritrixhost):8443/engine/(jobname)/job=
dir/crawler-beans.cxml

but the above one returns a 307 response from herit=
rix server. 

But the url 

https://(heritrixhost):8443/engine/job/(jobname=
)/jobdir/crawler-beans.cxml

Is this is a error on the API documentation or=
 something do with my configuration?

Please let me know 

Thanks
Rajkumar
